scripts.clean:reports: if exist cypress\reports (rmdir /S /Q cypress\reports) && mkdir cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports\mocha && mkdir cypress\reports\mochareports
scripts.create:dirs: mkdir cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports\mocha && mkdir cypress\reports\mochareports
scripts.pretest: npm run clean:reports && npm run create:dirs
scripts.posttest: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.test: npm run scripts && npm run posttest
